title: Tibetan spiritual leader Dalai Lama gets vaccine shot
description: The Dalai Lama, the 85-year-old Tibetan spiritual leader, was administered the first shot of the coronavirus vaccine on Saturday at a hospital in the north Indian hill town of Dharmsala.
